profile.profileName: [Keith Haring Archive, New York, NY, USA] Institutional archive
profile.profileDescription: This profile configures CollectiveAccess for use as an archive for video. It is intended for use by the Keith Haring Foundation in New York, USA (http://www.haring.com/)
